name: A pair of wrought iron bracers
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence a bit.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
